home.config.title: Set up your experience
home.config.subtitle: Customize your language and theme. You can change these options at any time.
home.config.save_preferences_desc: Your preferences will be saved in your session and synced with your profile.
preferences_explanation: You can change these preferences at any time from Settings.

profile.verification.title: Account verification
profile.verification.already_verified: Your account is already verified. Thanks for being an active member of the community.
profile.verification.description: If you are an official business, public figure or have a verifiable presence, you can request verification of your profile.
profile.verification.dialog.title: Request profile verification
profile.verification.dialog.label: Tell us why we should verify your profile
profile.verification.dialog.hint: For example: link to your official website, social networks, your role in the community‚Ä¶
profile.verification.snackbar.sent: Verification request sent. An admin will review it.
profile.verification.snackbar.error_pref: Could not send the verification request:
profile.appearance.title: Appearance
admin.center.title: BDIC admin center
admin.center.description: Access moderation, place management and advanced community metrics.
saved_places.title: Saved places
saved_places.empty: You haven't saved any places yet. Mark your favorite spots to see them here.
saved_places.error: Could not load your saved places.
saved_places.login_required: You must be logged in to save places.
place.detail.title: Information
map.recommended_because_suffix: , you might also like these places
map.permission_required: Grant location permission to center the map.
map.search_area.tooltip: Drop a pin to search places in that area
levels_info.title: Levels and rewards
levels_info.subtitle: How your levels work in BDIC
levels_info.description: Every contribution you make to the community (useful reports, photos, high‚Äëquality comments, upvotes from other users‚Ä¶) earns reputation points (XP). As you level up, you unlock titles and visual elements to customize your profile.
levels_info.progress_hint: This indicator shows how far you are from your next level jump.
levels_info.level.novice.desc: You are just starting your journey in the BDIC community. Explore the map, try the features and make your first contributions.
levels_info.level.explorer.desc: You actively explore your city and share useful information about places and experiences.
levels_info.level.active.desc: You are a constant contributor. Your reports, photos and opinions are becoming a reference for other users.
levels_info.level.reporter.desc: You are a reliable source of information. Your contributions help the entire community make decisions.
levels_info.level.master.desc: You are a true Community Master. Your activity and reputation can even lead you to moderation roles.
levels_info.rewards.titles: Exclusive public titles to show on your profile (for example: Urban explorer, Community guardian, BDIC ambassador).
levels_info.rewards.badges: Badges and visual seals that highlight important milestones of your participation.
levels_info.rewards.frames: In the future, frames and special effects for your avatar or profile card.
levels_info.rewards.other: Other cosmetic rewards that we will add as the community evolves.
levels_info.rewards_note: All rewards are cosmetic and you decide what to show on your profile from the visibility section.
home.onboard.map.title: Explore your city
home.onboard.map.desc: Discover amazing places near you. Use the interactive map to explore restaurants, cafes, parks and much more.
home.onboard.rating.title: Rate and comment
home.onboard.rating.desc: Share your opinion about the places you visit. Your reviews help other users make better decisions.
home.onboard.events.title: Stay informed
home.onboard.events.desc: Get notifications about events, promotions and important changes in your favorite places.
home.onboard.recommendations.title: Personalized recommendations
home.onboard.recommendations.desc: Based on your preferences, we show you places that might interest you. The more you interact, the better the recommendations.
